History.title: ISTANBUL
History.quote: "Istanbul, the city of poets, emperors, and dreamers. A legendary metropolis that hides a secret in every layer of history, uniting the past and future in the blue waters of the Bosphorus."
History.section1Desc: A magnificent journey from Byzantium founded in the 7th century BC to Constantinople, the 'New Rome' of the Roman Empire, and to the Ottoman's Dersaadet. Istanbul has been the capital of three great empires for 1600 years, witnessing sieges, victories, and cultural revolutions that changed the course of history.
History.section1Extra: Prayers echoing in the dome of Hagia Sophia, state secrets whispered in the corridors of Topkapi Palace, and time lost in the labyrinths of the Grand Bazaar... Istanbul is not just a city, but a living open-air museum.
History.section2Desc: While staying at our Solis City hotel, you will be at the very heart of this magical history. Our private concierge team is ready to make your Istanbul experience unforgettable with events specially prepared for you, such as the 'Historical Peninsula Tour' or 'Sunset Boat Tour on the Bosphorus'.
